name: patient_data
title: Patient Data
description: patient_data contains the collected information about each patient.

fields.name: patient_number
fields.title: Patient Number
fields.description: Unique reference number of the patient within the dataset

fields.name: date_announced
fields.title: Date Announced
fields.description: The date which DHS announced this patient is COVID-19 positive.

fields.name: date_added
fields.title: Date Added
fields.description: The date which this patient is added to CODD-K data base.

fields.name: age_bracket
fields.title: Age Bracket
fields.description: Age of the patient.

fields.name: gender
fields.title: Gender
fields.description: Gender of the patient

fields.name: residence_city_or_district
fields.title: Residence City or District
fields.description: The residence city or district of the patient.

fields.name: detected_city
fields.title: Detected City
fields.description: The city in which corresponding patient found COVID-19 positive.

fields.name: detected_district
fields.title: Detected District
fields.description: The district in which corresponding patient found COVID-19 positive.

fields.name: status
fields.title: Status
fields.description: The current status of the patiend. Five possibilities - Hospitalized,Discharged,Recovered,Deceased,Unspecified

fields.name: transmission_type
fields.title: Transmission Type
fields.description: Type of transmission

fields.name: notes
fields.title: Notes
fields.description: Notes about the patient.

fields.name: related_patients
fields.title: Related Patients
fields.description: Patients who got infected from this patient.

fields.name: known_cluster
fields.title: Known Cluster
fields.description: The cluster in which patient belongs to.

fields.name: dhs_patient_number
fields.title: DHS Patient Number
fields.description: For some patients DHS alloted a unique number.

fields.name: origin_state
fields.title: Origin State
fields.description: The state in which patient got infected.

fields.name: origin_country
fields.title: Origin Country
fields.description: The country in which patient got infected.

fields.name: district_patient_number
fields.title: District Patient Number
fields.description: Unique number assigned to this patient by the district authorities

fields.name: city_patient_number
fields.title: City Patient Number
fields.description: Unique number assigned to this patient by city authorities

fields.name: released
fields.title: Released Date
fields.description: The date on which patient got released.

fields.name: recovery_time
fields.title: Recovery Time
fields.description: Number of days between date_announced and released..

fields.name: deceased
fields.title: Deceased Date
fields.description: The date on which patient got deceased.

fields.name: reference
fields.title: References
fields.description: References to the collected data.
